org.yajasi.JungleJepps.jjtp
Class JungleJeppsmDNS

java.lang.Object
  org.yajasi.JungleJepps.jjtp.JungleJeppsmDNS

public class JungleJeppsmDNS
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages the client-side and server-side of multicast DNS. It is capable of broadcasting its services and finding providers that match its service critera.

Author:
Joel Jeske

Nested Class Summary
private static class JungleJeppsmDNS.Listener
          This class implements the JmDNS Service listener and modifies the providers queue and notifies any listeners of changes
static interface JungleJeppsmDNS.ProviderStatusListener
          This is a listener interface used to allow sub-clients to listen on the statuses of providers.
